app.name: AnyGlobe Changer
app.short_description: Changes your globe position for Wii games.
app.long_description: AnyGlobe Changer allows you to modify information that is stored on your wii that determine your flag and global position for games that use them online to display your region. Always wanted to display yourself as being on top of South Korea, but always feared of bricking your Wii? With over 2000+ subregions you can choose from without having to worry about bricking, your desires to customize your globe aesthetics are limitless!
